name: graph-node-1-pit-test-app
description: The example PIT Test Appliction for component named 'graph-node-1'
author: kindredgroup

scripts.dev.start: set -o allexport && source ../.env; TARGET_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:$SERVICE_PORT SERVICE_NAME=$TEST_APP_SERVICE_NAME SERVICE_PORT=$TEST_APP_SERVICE_PORT && set +o allexport && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev.build-image: npm run build && source ../.env; docker build -t $REGISTRY_URL/$TEST_APP_SERVICE_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG .
